data.text:
TECHNOLOGY REPLY & ORACLE

Technology Reply designs and implements systems integration and business process solutions using the Oracle technology.

Thanks to the expertise and experience acquired in twenty-five years of activity, Technology Reply supports its clients in their innovation and digital transformation processes, with teams composed by professional figures which are able to operate in all the phases of the life cycle of a project: analysis and design, implementation, roll-out and application maintenance.

Through specialization courses and participation in Beta Programs, Technology Reply - Oracle Platinum, Cloud Select and Cloud MSP Partner - pursues constant technological and methodological innovation that allows it to develop part of the more than 55 Oracle specializations obtained by the Reply Group.

The skills and the recognized market trust allow Technology Reply to act as a reference partner for Oracle on-premise and on-cloud technologies: BigData, Analytics, LowCode e BPM, eCommerce e Mobile, Identity and Access Management, Content Management, Service Operation.

Technology Reply, with its Agile culture, is an established leader on emerging technologies, successfully implementing Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning projects realized on microservices architectures for a wide range of customers, sectors and markets.

Banking Innovation

Article

Reengineering of a ETL Banking process

In the context of one of the main Italian banks, the Digital Inside project was developed in order to satisfy the strengthening of the transmission channel of heterogeneous flows, from the Subsidiaries to the Parent Company and the automation of the normalization and standardization phases of the data, following the quality check phases on data previously loaded into the system.

Banking

Best Practice

COMPLIANCE WITH EUROPEAN MIFID II REGULATION: THE NEW MIFID ENGINE

Technology Reply, the first Italian certified Oracle OPN Specialized Platinum Partner, over the years has supported and continues to actively support an important Italian banking reality in its programme of compliance with the current European regulations, through the use of Oracle technology for the development and integration of back-end engines that enable compliance checks with the latest regulations in the financial and advisory field.

Serverless

Article

Cloud providers and emerging platforms

The adoption of the serverless model, which is a software development approach that allows applications to be deployed without worrying about the underlying infrastructure, is continuously growing and has become a well-established reality in enterprise application development as well. The current range of services and platforms includes solutions for a wide range of use cases that Technology Reply Financial Services deals with on a daily basis.

DataHub

Case Study

Technology Reply DataHub 2.0

Technology Reply is a consolidated partner of Oracle in the use of Oracle SOA and BPM Suite products. In implementing these integration and business process digitization projects, we realized that it could be useful for our Clients to have a single, simplified console in which to perform the most frequent actions.

Supply Chain

Best Practice

Supply Chain Global Lakehouse

The design of the Global Lakehouse began with the creation of a Data Platform dedicated to the Supply Chain department, to reach the goal of unearth the entire logistical life cycle of the car, from the issue of purchase order to the delivery of the product to the final customer. The main purpose was the design of a solution to perform business analysis on a series of key KPIs of interest.

Low-code approach

Article

Low-code and flexibility: a new combination for the changing needs of the financial market.

The post-pandemic world has seen a strong push towards the digitization of business processes, setting new standards for adapting to changing market conditions. In this scenario, the Low-Code approach allows the end user to directly update processes and interfaces, bypassing demand management mechanisms and going live in real time.

OpenAPI and Third Part management

Article

Management of Third Part authorization

Consent management to treat personal data or user's authorization to execute payments from Third Part websites can be done without the need to provide personal data to the above mentioned website. The user can be redirected directly to his online banking site, where he can proceed to the approval.

Oracle

Best Practice

Oracle Content Management

Technology Reply, the first Italian Oracle Platinum Certified Partner, is supporting, for a major international utility company, with the goal of reducing licensing costs and improving the usability of editor content, the migration of sites currently on an Enterprise CMS in use by the customer to the Oracle Enterprise Web CMS âOracle Content Managementâ.

Lifecycle management process

Case Study

Unlikely to pay: new lifecycle management process

The reengineering process of the new information system of a well-known Italian bank provided a new challenge for Technology Reply to actively support the porting from an old application (resulting in the latter's decommissioning) to the new life-cycle management process of files associated with positions classified as Unlikely to pay.

Business Intelligence

Case Study

Global Emission Analysis Dashboard

Technology Reply has implemented a Business Intelligence solution on the QlikSense platform, to facilitate the monitoring of pollutant emissions produced by vehicle engines, for one of the most important groups in the Automotive and Agricultural machinery field, specialized in the production and design of the latest generation powertrains.

Banking System

Case Study

Operational co-management console

Technology Reply, first Italian partner certified Oracle OPN Specialized Platinum Partner, has developed and continues to actively support, for an important Italian direct bank, an innovative tool for the management of the new financial consultancy figures recently introduced in the banking staff to offer its customers an increasingly personalized service in line with the needs of each of them.

Appian

Best Practice

APPIAN: THE LOW CODE NEXT GENERATION PLATFORM

A trend kicks off when somebody starts thinking he/she could have been smarter, could have been cheaper, could have been faster. A trend ends when everybody is into it, and we canât miss the train! Appian, leader of the low code revolution, shows a trend with a 5x potential market growth by 2025, and can drive you into your digital innovation.

Big Data

Case Study

Global Connected Vehicle

Technology Reply has implemented a solution that allows our customer to collect, store and analyze data referring to a connected vehicle, with the aim of identifying common patterns and allowing the business and the team of data scientists to carry out deep dive analysis on phenomena related to the connected vehicle.

Oracle

Best Practice

AHC: Agency Health Check

Technology Reply has designed and implemented a cloud architecture for an important Italian insurance company that expressed the need of a system capable of recognize, categorize and visualize critical IT events that would generate an impact on the operation of any of its 1000+ insurance agencies located in the various Italian municipalities.

Manufacturing

Best Practice

CENTRAL CUSTOMER DATABASE

Technology Reply has engineered the âCentral Customer Databaseâ for a multinational company which operates in the automotive sector. Aim of the platform is the collection and analysis of data related to the customer experience: all the information about the times and ways customers get in touch with the company, with its products and its services.

MICROSERVICES

Best Practice

MICROSERVICES: STANDING ON THE SHOULDERS OF GIANTS

In a world where customers ask for a better Time To Market, always requiring high quality standards, it is essential to rely on industry experts with various successful experiences. Technology Reply adopts best practices, paradigms and techniques that have led giant companies to better manage the delivery of their applications based on Microservices architecture.

ORACLE

Best Practice

THE APP FOR EMPLOYEES

Technology Reply - Financial Services Group company Reply and partner Oracle was responsible for the creation, for a well-known financial group, of an application for mobile devices for company employees, which acts as an individual access point for a series of features used in everyday life that were offered by heterogeneous systems. In this way the employee has at his fingertips everything necessary to be able to interact smartly with his company.

Technology Replyâs point of view

Article

Fintech trends 2019

2019 kicked off as another exciting year for the technology in Financial Services.

The topic thatâs been dominating recently in talks with clients and industry specialists is definitely Fintech. Many events and conferences showcase the Fintech start-ups, that really span an incredibly wide range of technologies and applications.

Oracle

Case Study

Instant payment:

fast, immediateand secure

A few months after the launch of the new EBA Clearing platform based on a pan-European payment system, Technology Reply - Financial Services , a Reply Group company and Oracle partner specialised in the Banking and Financial world, developed the Middleware architecture for a well-known banking group and the new graphical interface of the instant bank transfer solution for one of the leading banking groups.

Oracle

Best Practice

CALCULATION OF RISK USING BIG DATA

In leading Savings Management Companies, the main task of the Quantitative Management desks is to monitor the level of risk associated with the customer portfolio, in order to highlight potential risk situations and, consequently, to reallocate the portfolio by varying its composition.

Oracle

Case Study

Software architecture for Fideuram investments: support for business intelligence

In addition to the excellent technological support provided within the scope of project and architecture development, the experience gained by Technology Reply in recent years has also allowed the company to offer a functional support service covering Fideuram Investimentiâs main areas of application, thereby minimising the delivery times associated with the development of new financial products.
